title: Model Wizard
subtitle: Step-by-step AI model provider setup
baseUrlRequired: This provider requires an API endpoint
streamingDesc: Real-time token streaming (disable for some local models)
configSummary: The following will be written to openclaw.json
noKeyDesc: You can set it via env variable or configure later
anthropicDesc: Claude models, strong reasoning and coding
moonshotDesc: Kimi models, ultra-long context, Chinese optimized
openrouterDesc: Model aggregator, one key for multiple models
ollamaDesc: Run open-source models locally, free, requires Ollama
moonshotTip: Get API Key at platform.moonshot.cn, baseUrl required
deepseekTip: Get API Key at platform.deepseek.com, baseUrl required
openrouterTip: Get API Key at openrouter.ai, use provider prefix for model IDs with /
ollamaTip: Ensure Ollama is running (ollama serve), no API Key needed
pitfallOllamaStream: Ollama streaming may corrupt tool names, consider disabling streaming
pitfallOpenrouterSlash: OpenRouter model IDs with / must use format: openrouter/vendor/model
